Energy poverty.Description: Efforts to reduce poverty can help alleviate energy poverty by improving access to resources and opportunities.
Increasing the use of renewable energy sources can help address energy poverty by providing affordable and sustainable power.
Improving energy efficiency in buildings and appliances can help reduce energy poverty by lowering energy costs and increasing access to energy services.
Energy poverty is exacerbated by the lack of access to electricity, which limits opportunities for education, healthcare, and economic development.
